author: anamnavi
body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

Added checks to the packaging script to detect running on Ubuntu 20.04 distribution, so that if Powershell is packaged and/or run in a sandbox it can perform accordingly for the Ubuntu 20.04 distribution/package, by getting its package dependencies (which matches that of its preview Dockerfile) and validating the platform to differentiate it from other valid platforms.

<!-- Summarize your PR between here and the checklist. -->

Helps to provide validation for the Ubuntu20.04 distribution and get the appropriate package dependencies and validation when its packaged up.

Related to #12626

<!-- Provide a little reasoning as to why this Pull Request helps and why you have opened it. -->

- **Tooling**
